channel.title: RuneBalance
channel.description:
[center]RuneBalance is my attempt at making a Project Insanity based RSPS. I'm starting with a really, really buggy DSPK base but I've fixed the majority of the problems so far. I'm going to update the post with logs and occasional media.
Current Features:
[code]new hitmarks walking dupe fixed fight pits dupe fixed korasi corp fixed tormented demons fixed slayer points (its own system) and rewards added donation credits added fixed "free quests" removed ugly skilling area removed spawn tab, added rule tab that looks tidy and proper removed the [P] and {P} buttons for spawn tab, added green circle-thing from achievement tab removed donator zone and spell book benefits. added teleport to new zone with shop added benefits to items in shop, such as double xp ring added "training" and "slayer" teleports to spellbook added glacors added frosts[/code]
[code]added vote points added better cache downloader fixed turmoil draining[/code]
Server Progress: 10%[/center]

item.title: RuneBalance
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“DaGamerChild, post:1, topic:525560”][center]So, I’m working on a “remake” of Hybrid PVP. I plan to release it as a playable server and host it for a while. It will not go by this name, but by my own name. I won’t say it here out of fear of it being discovered before its time.

Current Features:

new hitmarks walking dupe fixed fight pits dupe fixed korasi corp fixed tormented demons fixed slayer points (its own system) and rewards added donation credits added fixed "free quests" removed ugly skilling area removed spawn tab, added rule tab that looks tidy and proper removed the [P] and {P} buttons for spawn tab, added green circle-thing from achievement tab removed donator zone and spell book benefits. added teleport to new zone with shop added benefits to items in shop, such as double xp ring added "training" and "slayer" teleports to spellbook added glacors added frosts

What do you think? Should I release it as-is now to the community?
Would you play it?

ADDING MEDIA SOON.

Server Progress: 10%[/center][/quote]

I would not. Sounds like a normal PI add more unique like summoning (hybrid pvp had it, don’t call it hybrid-pvp when it doesn’t even have some features like hybrid pvp had) But goodluck aswell

Read full topic
